title: TechSchool
description: A comprehensive web-based e-learning platform developed using the MERN Stack. It features video tutorials with  review & rating system,  practice quizzes,  code editor, downloadable  notes/cheatsheets and a chatbot for user support.

title: Spotify Clone
description: A visually appealing Spotify clone designed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It delivers a seamless music experience with an optimized, responsive, and modern user interface with intactive music-bar and songs of a perticuler singer.

title: FitClub
description: A React-based frontend website created to establish a strong online presence for gyms. It effectively showcases services and enables seamless interaction with potential customers.
